title: - Lodging Business schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic description of a Lodging Business

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be LodgingBusiness

aggregateRating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/AggregateRating'. The average rating based on multiple ratings or reviews.

ratingCount.description: Property. The count of total number of ratings.

bestRating.description: Property. The highest value allowed in this rating system. If bestRating is omitted, 5 is assumed.

worstRating.description: Property. The lowest value allowed in this rating system. If worstRating is omitted, 1 is assumed.

ratingValue.description: Property. The rating for the content.

review.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Review'. A review of an item - for example, of a restaurant, movie, or store.

author.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The author of this content or rating.

datePublished.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date of first broadcast/publication.

reviewBody.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The actual body of the review.

name.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The name of the item.

reviewRating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Rating'. A rating is an evaluation on a numeric scale, such as 1 to 5 stars.

bestRating.description: Property. The highest value allowed in this rating system. If bestRating is omitted, 5 is assumed.

worstRating.description: Property. The lowest value allowed in this rating system. If worstRating is omitted, 1 is assumed.

ratingValue.description: Property. The rating for the content.

amenityFeature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/amenityFeature'. An amenity feature (e.g. a characteristic or service) of the Accommodation.

acceptsReservations.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/acceptsReservations'. Indicates whether a LodgingBusiness accepts reservations. Values can be Boolean, an URL at which reservations can be made

category.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of Lodging Business. Enumerated type.

checkinTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/checkinTime'. The earliest someone may check into a lodging establishment.

checkoutTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/checkoutTime'. The latest someone may check out of a lodging establishment.

numberOfRooms.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/numberOfRooms'. The number of rooms (excluding bathrooms and closets) of the accommodation or lodging business.

paymentAccepted.description: Property. The price range of the business, for example $$$. Model:'https://schema.org/paymentAccepted'

petsAllowed.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/petsAllowed'. Indicates whether pets are allowed to enter the accommodation or lodging business.

priceRange.description: Property. The price range of the business, for example $$$. Model:'https://schema.org/priceRange'

facilities.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Facilities at this Medical Organization. Allowed values: OPD, Minor OT, Physiotherapy, Laboratory Services, ECG Services, Pharmacy, Radiology/X-ray Facility, Ambulance Services, OT

medicalSpeciality.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/MedicalSpecialty'. Any specific branch of medical science or practice. Medical specialities include clinical specialties that pertain to particular organ systems and their respective disease states, as well as allied health specialties. Enumerated type.

medicineSystem.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/MedicineSystem'. Systems of medical practice. Enumerated type.

testingFacility.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Types of tests available. Enumerated type.

refSeeAlso.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. List of references to one or more related entities.
